about_the_game:
NMO is a thrilling multiplayer (3 to 6 players) game where one player, the impostor (Ox), lurks in the shadows to deceive and neutralize the Operators, while others take on the role of Operators, working independently or cooperatively to identify and eliminate the Ox hidden among them.

=== Operators ===

Embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure within the winding corridors of the Ark, only to find yourselves trapped during a routine check! The freight elevator stands inaccessible, locked to the upper floors, while an impostor, the Ox, threatens your very survival.

As a First Person Operator, your mission is clear: find an escape route by either reactivating the freight elevator before the Ox he strike. Will you forge alliances with your comrades or brave the challenge alone?

To reactivate the hoist, you must interact with scattered computers across the map. Each computer allows you to deactivate a brake, and once all six brakes are disabled, the elevator will initiate its descent, offering you a chance at victory.

Think you've identified the Ox? Neutralize him with the Taser (you will need energy, which you can get at specific points on the map). You'll also discover other invaluable items to aid your investigation and devise cunning strategies.

Rely on the O.S.P. (Operator Security Palm) to customize your game strategy and/or navigate the game map

Survive the ordeal and thwart the Ox's sinister plans, whoever he may be...

=== Ox ===

Your moment of opportunity has arrived! Seize this inspection to set your master plan in motion: suppress all operators or prevent them from escaping by beating them to the punch.

Your objective is clear: eliminate every Operator or prevent them from getting on the freight elevator.

Navigate the challenge from a third-person perspective, boasting broader perception and superior visibility to maneuver deftly in the shadows. Utilize your mask to conceal your identity from the Operators, who will unmistakably recognize you as the Ox.

Seal the freight elevator to buy precious time. Charge the Taser and clear your path.

Operate in darkness, disabling power generators for swift, silent kills.

Remain concealed, exercise stealth, and avoid raising suspicion. Cultivate trust among your fellow Operators, only to eliminate them at the most opportune moments.

Freedom beckons, just a step away...

name: NMO - No More Operators

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended to play on low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: NMO is a thrilling multiplayer (3 to 6 players) game where one player, the impostor (Ox), lurks in the shadows to deceive and neutralize the Operators, while others take on the role of Operators, working independently or cooperatively to identify and eliminate the Ox hidden among them.
